name: Oleg Teretenko
headerTaglineFour: This is a small selection of my past projects

projects.title: Security questions
projects.description: A new feature design had to be developed for the bank's mobile application. Control questions are an additional way of identifying the client. In the app settings, the user should understand the purpose of control questions, select a question and provide an answer.

projects.title: Routing control
projects.description: The main task of the project is to create an interface for the bank's technical support service, which is responsible for installing new application releases and troubleshooting. To configure and redirect traffic between data centers (DC), you need to access the code using different applications. It's tedious and inconvenient. The new UI can switch traffic between DC's when we have an accident with one of them (when one of the DC's is offline), when we want to start beta testing, or when we want to do a smooth rollout of the new release.

services.title: Art Direction
services.description: We help with the creation and development of online advertising ideas, with particular focus on their visual appearance.

services.title: Branding
services.description: We design key brand elements such as the logo, color scheme, typography, and other design components that makes your brand stand out from competitors.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: We build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

services.title: 3D Design
services.description: We combine creative design and technical skills to build striking 3D visualisations that bring your project to life.

aboutpara:
Hi, I'm Oleg Teretenko. I have been passionate about design since 2015.
I'm from Krasnoyarsk, Russia, where I obtained my Masterâ€™s degree in Engineering and Technology.
I also have certificates in Mail Group UX/UI design, and Yandex HTML & CSS.

I currently live in Moscow, where I work as a Senior Designer at VTB bank.
I create UX and UI designs of web interfaces for internal banking products.
I also design new features for clients for web, iOS, and Android platforms.
My work process is to empathize, define, ideate, prototype, and test. In this way, I design concepts based on simplicity.

When I'm not working, I divide my free time between listening to or playing music (yes, Iâ€™m a musician), watching movies or series, or just enjoying the city with friends.

Send me message to start building something unique together.

I have been working in fintech for the last 2 years. I create UX and UI designs of web interfaces for internal banking products. I also design new features for bank clients for web, iOS, and Android platforms.
My work process is to empathize, define, ideate, prototype, and test. In this way, I design concepts based on simplicity.

I have certificates in Mail Group UX/UI design, Yandex HTML & CSS and GoPractice Product metrics.
